channel.title: Clan Chat

item.title: Clan Chat
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Well the ::cm works just fine but when someone types “/” they get
player rights=0,1, or 2(in red)
a whole bunch of letters which some thave the name in
then size 0(in green)

Now here’s the code in the client: [code]

if(s.startsWith("/"))
{
aString887 = aString887.substring(1);
method77(“player rights =” +anInt863, 16, “”, aBoolean991);

if(anInt863 == 8){
method77(aString887, 15, “@cr6@”, aBoolean991);
}else{
//size -= 10;
method77(aString887, 15, “”, aBoolean991);

method77("size is " +size, 17, “”, aBoolean991);

}

aString887 = “”;
break;
}
if(aString887.startsWith("/")) {
aString887 = “::cm” +aString887.substring(0);
}
if(s.startsWith("@red@"))
{
aString887 = aString887.substring(5);
method77(aString887, 16, “”, aBoolean991);
aString887 = “”;
break;
}
if(s.startsWith("@gre@"))
{
aString887 = aString887.substring(5);
method77(aString887, 17, “”, aBoolean991);
aString887 = “”;
break;
}[/code]

Read full topic
